ygData.subject: Re: Illigeble Scoll and Rondo
ygData.msgSnippet: I did not open the attachment to Linds email and did not get the worm.  I never open attachments from these list for this very reason. ... From: Dan Alexander
ygData.messageBody:
I did not open the attachment to Linds' email and did not get the worm. I
never open attachments from these list for this very reason.
-----Original Message-----
From: Dan Alexander <dalex@...>
To: EQ-Quest@onelist.com <EQ-Quest@onelist.com>
Cc: j_baouns@... <j_baouns@...>
Date: Wednesday, June 30, 1999 10:44 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Quest] Illigeble Scoll and Rondo


>From: Dan Alexander <dalex@...>
>
>Jimmy, you're infected with a virus called Happy99. It secretly sends out
>a copy of itself when you email someone. In this case, it sent itself to
>everyone on the EQ-Quest mailing list. Visit www.mcafee.com, get a virus
>scanner, and run it to disinfect yourself.
>
>Subscribers, scan your harddrive for a file attachment called happy99.exe
>and delete it. *Do not run it.*
>
>-Pennaggolan
>
>
>At 09:22 AM 06/30/1999, you wrote:
>>From: "Jimmy Lind" <j_baouns@...>
>>
>>
>>Attachment Converted: "C:\TEMP\Happy99.exe"
>>
>>
>>--------------------------- ONElist Sponsor ----------------------------
>>
>>Looking for a new hobby? Want to make a new friend?
>>http://www.onelist.com
>>Come join one of 180,000 e-mail communities at ONElist!
>>
>>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>>
